H0.text: What company bought Time Warner in 2001 - the biggest merger in U.S. history. Microsoft

H1.text: What company bought Time Warner in 2001 - the biggest merger in U.S. history. Comcast

H2.text: What company bought Time Warner in 2001 - the biggest merger in U.S. history. Disney

H3.text: What company bought Time Warner in 2001 - the biggest merger in U.S. history. AOL

A4.text: In 2001, at the height of its popularity, it purchased the media conglomerate Time Warner in the largest merger in US history.
